channel.title: Forbes.com Business News
channel.description: Business news and reports from Forbes.com

item.title: Are You An Innovator?
item.description: Innovation expert Clayton Christensen on what you need to know to shake things up.
item.author: Clayton Christensen

item.title: Jilted In Germany
item.description: Deutsche Boerse could find itself left at the altar again.
item.author: Liz Moyer

item.title: World's Worst Waste
item.description: Western nations and the U.S. lead the world in waste production, and the problem is far from being under control.
item.author: Robert Malone

item.title: Fannie's Flayed
item.description: Regulators slap the mortgage giant with a $400 million fine and tough language.
item.author: Liz Moyer

item.title: The Vioxx Maelstrom
item.description: Two words sum up the recent data on Merck's disastrous drug: insufficient and depressing.
item.author: Matthew Herper
